title: Market Price Predictor using ML
features: Designed and executed a reproducible ML pipeline with ZenML and MLflow, automating data ingestion, feature engineering, and model training to forecast market prices with 8% RMSE reduction over baseline.
Performed comprehensive EDA using pandas, seaborn, and statsmodels, uncovering key predictors and addressing missing values, which informed feature selection and boosted model performance by 12%.

Implemented production-ready deployment artifacts, including Dockerized inference service and real-time API endpoints, ensuring 99.9% uptime and facilitating seamless integration into downstream analytics workflows.
